name: walmart-recruiting-trip-type-classification
data_intro: Use market basket analysis to classify shopping trips

cat_feature_intro.TripType: a categorical id representing the type of shopping trip the customer made. This is the ground truth that you are predicting. TripType_999 is an 'other' category.
cat_feature_intro.DepartmentDescription: a high-level description of the item's department

num_feature_intro.VisitNumber: an id corresponding to a single trip by a single customer
num_feature_intro.Upc: the UPC number of the product purchased
num_feature_intro.ScanCount: the number of the given item that was purchased. A negative value indicates a product return.
num_feature_intro.FinelineNumber: a more refined category for each of the products, created by Walmart
